cause.description:
For too long have we been put down by the sleemans hunny lauger drinkers, for too long have we been looked upon as outcasts by the fine wine drinkers of the world, and for too long have we sat back and let others dictate how one should drink a beer.
Its our time now. Put down the beer bong, and pick up your hole punching tools. Its time to shotgun some fucking beer, or wine, or maults.
1. If you're going to drink, you mine as well drink hard
2. If your going to drink hard, you mine as well buy the cheapest shit you can get ahold of
3. If its in a can, it CAN and WILL be shotgunned.
4. No one shotguns alone.
